summary: A small home with stable in the Morthal swamp. Cozy, lots of garden area and family oriented.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/][img]https://i.creativecommons.org/l/by-nc-nd/4.0/88x31.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/]Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0
International License[/url].[/center]

[b][size=4][color=#97d99e]A small home in the Morthal swamp. [/color][/size][/b]

[color=#49e838]Includes:[/color]

• walking bridge to the south and east
• added decorative pieces to interior
• stable with cow/chickens
• large garden area
• planter garden
• armory crafting setup outside with storage (key on kitchen table)
• allows up to 3 children (if using TMPhoenix Multiple Adoptions)
• alchemy/enchanting in house
• oven/cooking pot with custom storage for food
• working [color=#deda9b]Butter Churn[/color]
• the wood chopping block is by the back door
• added fish hatchery - as requested

[b][size=3][color=#97d99e]** REQUIRES HEARTHFIRES DLC[/color][/size][/b]
author: LeianneG
